oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Lists of Payments
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Greene, Colton; Gutherz, Carl;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: List of payments for supplies and to individuals; $500 to Carl Gutherz, $850.75 for invitations, $284.75 for librettos, and other payments totalling $15,342.60; four additional sheets showing calculations used to derive figures; all five sheets written in pencil on verso of Copartnership Notice of Greene & Lucas.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Manuscript collection processed by John Jones
